main event: Three small white lights appeared to assemble in a diamond formation near Biggs AFB, Texas, on July 3, 1960.
interesting points: The lights were reported to operate at an elevation of approximately 5,000 feet., The sighting lasted between 5 and 10 seconds., Observers described the phenomenon as having a white glowing trail that extended behind the lights., The lights disappeared instantaneously towards the southeast., The investigation concluded there was no positive evidence to confirm the sighting.
sighted object: three small white lights in a diamond formation
witness description: military personnel from Biggs AFB, considered reliable by supervisory personnel
